body.name: Jergens Shea + Cocoa Butter Body Lotion for Dry Skin, Deep Conditioning Moisturizer, with Vitamins E & B3, 8.5 oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: INTENSELY HYDRATES - Intense hydration for dryness-prone areas to even skin tone and texture
WHIPPED BUTTER BLEND - African Shea butter, cocoa butter, Vitamin E and B3, hydrates and evens tone
EVENS TONE - In just 4 weeks, this formula intensely hydrates and creates a more even skin tone.
VEGAN FRIENDLY FORMULA - This formula is paraben-free, cruelty free, and vegan friendly
WITH VITAMINS B3 & E - Deeply hydrating hand and body moisturizer with Vitamins B3 & E
body.description: This tone-enriching formula, with a blend of naturally derived African Shea butter, nourishing cocoa butter, Vitamin E, and Vitamin B3, deeply hydrates and evens skin tone. In just 4 weeks, this formula intensely hydrates and creates a more even skin tone. This rich formula intensely hydrates dry-prone areas and promotes even skin tone and texture. The whipped butter texture feels great on your hands and body while hydrating and moisturizing your body. This formula is vegan friendly, cruelty free, and paraben free so you can feel good about putting it on your skin. Our Story: Since 1901, Jergens skin care has been the trusted brand for comforting moisture. That’s because everything we do is designed to help you feel good – soothing relief from dryness, a touch of summer color, a fruity scent that makes Monday feel like Friday. We’re not here to stop at skin deep. We’re here to help you feel truly, deeply, skin-to-soul comfortable, with a few surprises along the way. We bottle all that up into the Feel-Good Feeling of Jergens.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Shea + Cocoa. It’s double butta love. With naturally derived African shea butter and rich cocoa butter, Jergens Deep Conditioning Shea + Cocoa Butter Moisturizer hydrates on a deeper level. Skin shines all day with that moisture-whipped afterglow. In just 4 weeks, it looks more even toned. Whipped butter blend Naturally derived African shea butter, cocoa butter, vitamins B3 and E Immediately: 24-hour hydration, skin looks and feels nourished and soft with a healthy sheen and smooth texture In 4 weeks: Smooths rough patches and fades dark marks creating a more even tone Vegan friendly , cruelty free, paraben free, dermatologist tested, naturally derived African shea butter Our moisturizer is vegan friendly, with no animal testing and no materials from animal origin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells like heaven
reviews.reviewText: This is hands down my favorite lotion ever! It smells like heaven...not too overpowering at all. The best part...it is SO moisturizing and quenches my dry skin. It's not greasy at all. It literally just soaks right into my skin. THE BEST lotion and feels so high end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's light and works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the smell and how it leaves skin super soft

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s a really good moisturizer but I’m not a fan of the smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Thick rich smells nice. Keeps you moisturized. Love this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luxury is affordable!
reviews.reviewText: This is a lovely lotion. I have dry skin and put lotion on after every shower. I will say this lotion is long lasting and one application is all that is needed it works all day and I just want to say how nice it is to go thru a day feeling comfy in my skin, I am almost forty so I have tried many and this is top of my list that I can keep in my vanity and stay in budget! Win win!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Daily Delight: Jergens Shea + Cocoa Butter Lotion
reviews.reviewText: Jergens Shea + Cocoa Butter Lotion has the perfect scent – not too overpowering, just a delightful hint of goodness. It adds a nice touch to my daily routine, making me feel fresh and pampered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loving the lotion
reviews.reviewText: I have dry skin and this moisturizes very well. It also has faint but pleasant scent to it.
it smells really good and a lot of my friends told me I smelled good even though I didn’t wear any perfume
